expected_behavior: Agent dispatches 3 Pass A subagents with different file orderings (discovery, reversed, LOC-sorted)
Each Pass A subagent scans all files but in its assigned order
Majority voting is applied: files flagged by 2+ of 3 subagents get priority routing to Pass B
Files flagged by only 1 subagent are included in Pass B at lower priority
Files flagged by 0 subagents are skipped in Pass B (quick scan only)
The deterministic ordering diversity achieves perspective diversity without requiring RNG
